references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF: A Multiscale Representation for Anti-aliasing Neural Radiance Fields
references.reason: This paper proposes Mip-NeRF, a multiscale representation for anti-aliasing neural radiance fields, which is used as the underlying technology for the base model in MimicTalk.
This paper proposes a method to reconstruct a canonical 3D face (formulated as tri-plane representation), which is used in MimicTalk to generate high-quality talking face videos.

references.paper_title: Neural Voice Puppetry: Audio-Driven Facial Reenactment
references.reason: This paper is highly related to the task of expressive facial motion generation, which is a key component of MimicTalk.
This paper introduces flow matching, an advanced generative model used in MimicTalk to generate high-quality and expressive facial motions.

references.paper_title: LoRA: Low-Rank Adaptation of Large Language Models
references.reason: This paper introduces LoRA, a low-rank adaptation technique used in MimicTalk for efficient and stable finetuning of the person-agnostic model.
